Name: Vtuber Simulator : Vtuber模擬器
About the game: 'Vtuber Simulator' developed by a one-person independent development team RA Studio. Customize your own character, streaming, training, and become a famous Vtuber! 【Game Introduction】 It’s an era when everyone wants to be a Vtuber, The protagonist wants to be a famous Vtuber! 【Game Features】 -Customized character system! -Easy and happy story -Train yourself to make the live broadcast more interesting. -Solve the problems encountered during the live broadcast -Edit and upload videos to get the most authentic reply! -If the target fails, you can inherit the attributes and start again! Hi, everyone ! I am RA studio game producer Ryan ,from a one-man studio. 'Vtuber Simulator' was made in my spare time alone. I really like the culture of Vtuber, so i made this. Translating into a language other than Chinese is very hard, there may be problems, please leave a message for advice. Hope everyone will like it.
